data.description:
Sucker Punch VR is a heart-pounding single and multiplayer experience! Punch cubes past your opponent to score. Unleash power-ups to defend your goal or overwhelm your opposition! Level up and build your arsenal of powerful gloves and drones. Discover combinations that fit your play style. You’ll need lightning fast reflexes and cunning strategy to become the ultimate Sucker Punch VR champion!

NEW: Enter Arcade Mode and battle through progressively more difficult drones! Defeat each boss and push your high score up the global leaderboard!

UNLEASH YOUR POWERS - YOUR WAY
Gain access to an arsenal of gloves and equipment, each with their own powers. Mix and match to find your perfect playing style.

SINGLE AND MULTIPLAYER
Play a training match versus AI, or grab a friend and go head-to-head via multiplayer. Need a bigger challenge? Play the new Arcade Mode or start a season and climb the leaderboards for trophies and ultimate glory!

changelog.change_log: Balancing powers and minor bug updates

1.15 Sucker Punch VR Update!

- Wield the new Robo Fist!
- Overwhelm your enemies with the new Slicer Wall power!
- Play new rule sets.
- Experience the updated Nutz Wood level in the Arcade.
- Expert drone balancing
...and some minor bug fixes and balancing.

Welcome to the Arcade!

A NEW game mode in Sucker Punch VR!

Progress through the levels, battling progressively more difficult drones! Defeat each boss drone and push your high score up the leaderboard! Holding the highest score will take cunning strategy and lightning reflexes.

Welcome to your next challenge!

1.12 Sucker Punch VR update!

* Easier to see Scores!
* 90 Hz!
* Timed challenges now available in Training and Multiplayer
* See your record vs each drone
* Improved punching! Hear, feel, and see the cubes fear your fists
* Play in the updated Playground Arena
* ...and some minor UI updates, power balancing, and bug fixes

Release notes:
- New Arena! Subway
- Winter arena = de-Holidayed, now its Winter Wood
- Leaderboard update! New weekly leaderboard. Daily challenges add up for the week and a weekly champion is crowned! We'll be praising that champion for that week for all to behold!
- New timed daily challenge variant. A new challenge to mix things up for the new challenge leaderboards.
- Challenge scoring re-work. Updated how the scoring works to make it better.
- Bug fixes and polishing.
- Lots of little stuff.

Sucker Punching (with) friends is so much fun!

Sucker Punch VR 1.10 update brings an overhaul to the Multiplayer match experience!

Notes:
* Multiplayer menu and match creation overhaul (no more room codes!)
* A new glove! (Lancers Gauntlet)
* New power! (Lance of Heros)
* Bug fixes & polish

Unleash the power of the 'Warp Bash' with a new glove 'The Ogre'!
Those pesky force fields getting in your way? Bash cubes straight through anything between you and your opponent.

Update Highlights:
* New Glove: The Ogre
* New Power: Warp Bash
* Haptic options added to settings
* Balancing & polish
* Bug fixes and such

New League...buckle up because this one is a challenge.
New Advanced Drones.
Improved AI....is this how Skynet starts...?
New Seasonal Arena.
Bug fixes and such.

One Ring to Punch Them ALL!

New glove update! “The One” wielding the “Wreath of Flame”!

Update Notes:
* New Glove: The One
* New Power: Wreath of Flame
* Bug fixes and polish

New Kodiak Glove!

Bug fixes and rebalancing some powers.
